A drivable surface marked by parallel white or yellow lane lines.

A linear infrastructure element with consistent width and smooth surface.
A traffic corridor edged by sidewalks, buildings, or grass in oblique view.

A geometrically regular structure with high contrast against unpaved areas.
A continuous asphalt band aligned with vehicle travel direction.
A road displaying road signs or markings visible from drone perspective.
A transportation artery surrounded by parking lots or curbside vehicles.

A linear feature with consistent albedo and minimal surface roughness.
A gray-toned corridor often intersecting with other roads at right angles.

A dark, homogeneous surface distinguishable from concrete or gravel.
A structured route with road shoulders or drainage features visible overhead.

A transportation strip clearly separated from pedestrian walkways above.

A multi-story structure showing window patterns and rooftop equipment from aerial perspective.
A man-made edifice surrounded by paved surfaces or vegetation in UAV imagery.
A building with high contrast between roof color and surrounding terrain.
A structure exhibiting symmetrical edges and right-angle corners viewed from above.
A residential building with tiled or metal roofing visible under sunlight.
A commercial building with large glass windows reflecting sky or nearby objects.
A building marked by shadowed walls and bright rooftop highlights in oblique view.
A complex of connected structures forming an urban block from drone altitude.
A building with visible rooftop vents, HVAC units, or solar panels.
A structure with consistent height profile and minimal vegetation on its roof.
A building outlined by roadways or parking lots, emphasizing its footprint.
A single-family home with pitched roof and driveway visible in high-res UAV image.
A building with irregular shape but clear man-made boundaries against natural ground.
A structure displaying repetitive window grids or facade patterns from above.
A building partially obscured by trees but identifiable by roof geometry.
A large industrial facility with expansive flat roof and loading docks visible.
A building with shadowed sides indicating height and vertical structure in oblique shot.
A structure whose roof color differs significantly from adjacent soil or grass.
A building with visible access roads or driveways leading to its entrance.
A high-rise building showing vertical alignment and multiple floor levels from UAV.
A building with rooftop antennas, chimneys, or water tanks as distinguishing features.
A building surrounded by other buildings, forming a dense urban cluster.
A building with low albedo roof (e.g., dark asphalt) contrasting with bright surroundings.
A structure identified by its rectilinear form and lack of natural surface texture.
A building with visible eaves, gutters, or overhangs casting shadows in sunlight.
A building with rooftop markings, such as helipad symbols or maintenance zones.
A building whose scale is evident through comparison with nearby vehicles or trees.
A man-made construction with clear edges, defined roof plane, and no vegetation cover.

A vehicle casting a distinct shadow aligned with its orientation from above.
A car visible as a compact shape with rounded corners and consistent color.
A sedan or SUV identifiable by its elongated body and wheel arches in drone view.
A vehicle parked parallel to a road or curb, showing clear alignment.
A car with reflective surfaces catching sunlight, especially on windows or hood.
A moving car captured as a blurred streak along a paved surface.
A white or silver car contrasting sharply against dark pavement or grass.
A vehicle surrounded by other cars in a parking lot, forming a grid-like pattern.
A car viewed from above with visible roofline, windshield, and rear window.
A compact car distinguishable by its size relative to nearby buildings or trees.
A vehicle with visible wheels or tire shadows under bright daylight conditions.
A car parked perpendicular to a building entrance, indicating access point.
A dark-colored vehicle blending slightly with asphalt but outlined by shadow.
A car identified by its symmetry and smooth contours against textured ground.
A van or truck with larger footprint and boxy shape compared to passenger cars.
A vehicle partially occluded by trees but recognizable by roof geometry.
A car with sunroof or antenna visible as small protrusions on rooftop.
A group of cars lined up along a street, showing consistent spacing and direction.
A vehicle in motion with slight motion blur, distinguishable from static objects.
A car with tinted windows reflecting sky or surrounding structures.
A vehicle positioned at an intersection, aligned with road markings.
A car identifiable by its scale — smaller than buildings, larger than pedestrians.
A red or blue car standing out among neutral-colored surroundings.
A car with visible license plate area or bumper details in high-res UAV image.
A vehicle parked near a driveway or garage, indicating residential use.
A car with shadow extending away from the sun, revealing its 3D form.
A vehicle captured during low-angle sunlight, enhancing contrast and texture.
A car distinguishable from motorcycles or bicycles by its wider body and four wheels.
A man-made object with uniform color and clean edges, contrasting with natural terrain.

A cluster of trees forming a dense green patch with overlapping canopies.
A tree identifiable by its radial symmetry and organic edge contours.

A coniferous tree with pointed top and darker green hue compared to surroundings.

A tree surrounded by grass or pavement, highlighting its natural texture contrast.

A tree aligned along a road or sidewalk, forming a linear green corridor.
A tree with bright green leaves contrasting sharply against gray asphalt.
A tree identified by its irregular, non-geometric outline against man-made structures.
A palm or exotic tree with unique crown shape distinguishable from broadleaf.

A tree in a park or garden, surrounded by other vegetation and pathways.
A tree with uniform green tone indicating healthy foliage in summer imagery.
A tree identifiable by its scale — larger than shrubs, smaller than buildings.
A tree with dappled light and shadow patterns across its crown under sunlight.

A tree positioned at intersection of roads, serving as landmark or buffer zone.
A tree with visible trunk shadow extending toward the sun, revealing 3D form.
A tree captured during low-angle sunlight, enhancing texture and depth perception.
A tree distinguishable from bushes by its height, crown spread, and trunk visibility.
A natural object with organic shape, no straight edges, and high textural complexity.

A grassy field showing subtle color variation under sunlight and shadow.
A dense vegetated area with no distinct tree trunks or canopy edges.
A cultivated crop field with linear or grid-like planting patterns from drone view.
A natural meadow with irregular boundaries blending into soil or pavement.
A shrubland area with low, bushy texture and muted green-brown tones.
A vegetation zone contrasting sharply against adjacent roads or buildings.
A seasonal crop field showing early growth stages with sparse coverage.
A weedy or overgrown patch with chaotic texture and mixed green hues.
A lawn area with smooth, even surface and clear edge against sidewalk or asphalt.
A marshy or wetland vegetation with darker green tones and water reflections.

A vineyard or orchard row displaying parallel lines of low plants from aerial view.

A fire-scarred or grazed field with patchy regrowth and brown-green mosaics.
A rooftop garden or urban green space with structured planting beds.
A field with flowering crops showing speckled color patterns (e.g., canola, lavender).

human: A small upright figure with dark clothing, visible as a pixel-sized blob from above.
A person walking along a sidewalk, casting a narrow shadow aligned with movement.
A human silhouette distinguishable by vertical posture and head-shoulder outline.
A group of people clustered near a building entrance or street corner.
A solitary figure standing out against light-colored pavement or grass.
A person captured mid-stride, showing slight motion blur in high-speed UAV footage.
A human wearing bright clothing (red, yellow) contrasting with surroundings.
A crowd of tiny figures forming a dense cluster on a plaza or road.
A person identifiable by scale — smaller than cars, larger than birds or debris.
A human casting a directional shadow revealing body orientation under sunlight.
A pedestrian near a crosswalk, aligned with road markings and traffic flow.
A person partially occluded by trees or vehicles but recognizable by shape.
A human with visible backpack or bag as protrusion from torso in top-down view.
A group moving in formation, such as runners, cyclists, or parade participants.
A person sitting or crouching, appearing as low-profile shape with bent limbs.
A human figure with color contrast between clothing and ground surface.
A person near a vehicle, indicating interaction or boarding activity.
A lone walker on an open field, emphasizing isolation and scale.
A human captured during low-angle sunlight, enhancing shadow length and form.
A person identifiable by repetitive motion pattern — e.g., swinging arms while walking.
A child or adult distinguished by relative size within a family group.
A human with umbrella or hat visible as circular object above head.
A person in uniform or reflective vest, standing out due to consistent color.
A crowd dispersing or gathering, showing dynamic spatial distribution.
A human near water edge, with reflection subtly altering appearance.
A person lying down or resting, appearing as elongated horizontal shape.
A human interacting with infrastructure — e.g., opening gate, pushing cart.
A figure with discernible limbs and torso despite low resolution.
